Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.storage

Class Warehouse

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.storage.Warehouse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storage, ObservableFromView
public class Warehouse
extends java.lang.Object
implements Storage, ObservableFromView

  • Method Details

    • addResources

      public void addResources​(int depotNumber, ResourceType res, int num) throws IncompatibleDepotException
      Adds the specified resources to the specified depot. Notifies of the change happened.
      Parameters:
      depotNumber - the number of the depot where to add the resources
      res - the type of the resources to be added
      num - the amount of the resources to be added
      Throws:
      IncompatibleDepotException - if is already existing a standard depot with the same resource type

    • putResources

      private void putResources​(int depotNumber, ResourceType res, int num) throws IncompatibleDepotException
      Adds the specified resources to the specified depot.
      Parameters:
      depotNumber - the number of the depot where to add the resources
      res - the type of the resources to be added
      num - the amount of the resources to be added
      Throws:
      IncompatibleDepotException - if is already existing a standard depot with the same resource type

    • removeResources

      public Requirements removeResources​(Requirements requirements)
      Removes the specified resources from the storage (as long as there are) and returns the missing resources that couldn't be removed.
      Specified by:
      removeResources in interface Storage
      Parameters:
      requirements - the resources to be removed from the storage
      Returns:
      the the missing resources that couldn't be removed

    • removeResources

      private int removeResources​(int depotNumber, int num)
      Removes the selected resources from the selected depot if possible. returns the number of resources that are still to be removed.
      Parameters:
      depotNumber - the number of the depot from which the resources are to be removed
      num - the number of resources to remove
      Returns:
      the number of resources that are still to be removed

    • toBeStored

      public void toBeStored​(Resource[] resources)
      Adds the specified resources to the toBeStored storage, that will need to be stored in the depots or discarded.
      Parameters:
      resources - the resources to be added

    • pushResourceToBeStored

      public void pushResourceToBeStored​(Resource resource)
      Adds the resource on top of the toBeStored Stack
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource that is pushed

    • swapDepots

      public void swapDepots​(int first, int second) throws IncompatibleDepotException
      Swaps the content of the two specified depots.
      Parameters:
      first - the number of the first depot
      second - the number of the second depot
      Throws:
      IncompatibleDepotException
